body_html:
@kirilg You save my day. In my case, adding cxx_builtin_include_directory: "/usr/local/cuda-7.5/include" to third_party/gpus/crosstool/CROSSTOOL works, but cxx_builtin_include_directory: "/usr/local/cuda/include" doesn't.

Seems that the building system is not as smart as cmake.

@kirilg You save my day. In my case, adding `cxx_builtin_include_directory: "/usr/local/cuda-7.5/include"`  to `third_party/gpus/crosstool/CROSSTOOL` works, but `cxx_builtin_include_directory: "/usr/local/cuda/include"` doesn't.

Seems that the building system is not as smart as cmake.
